00014 class Cell {
00015     private:
00016         AbstractCell* _p;
00017 
00018     public:
00019         Cell (AbstractCell* p) {
00020             _p = p;}
00021 
00022         Cell (char c) {
00023             if (c == '.' || c == '*') {
00024                 _p = new ConwayCell(c);
00025             } else {
00026                 _p = new FredkinCell(c);
00027             }
00028         }
00029 
00030         Cell (const Cell& that) {
00031             if (!that._p)
00032                 _p = 0;
00033             else
00034                 _p = that._p->clone();}
00035 
00036         ~Cell () {
00037             delete _p;}
00038 
00039         Cell& operator = (Cell that) {
00040             swap(that);
00041             return *this;}
00042 
00043         char get() const {
00044             return _p->get();
00045         }
00046 
00047         void eval() {
00048             _p->eval();
00049             // Special case: if you're a Fredkin cell
00050             if (FredkinCell* p = dynamic_cast<FredkinCell*>(_p)) {
00051                 // and your age has become 2
00052                 if (p->age == 2) {
00053                     // then you become a ConwayCell
00054                     delete _p;
00055                     _p = new ConwayCell('*');
00056                 }
00057             }
00058         }
00059 
00060         void swap (Cell& that) {
00061             std::swap(_p, that._p);
00062         }
00063 
00064         bool isAlive() {
00065             return _p->isAlive();
00066         }
00067

00069             _p->conwayInc();
00070         }
00071 
00072         void incNeighbors() {
00073             _p->incNeighbors();
00074         }

00077             _p->setNeighbors(n);
00078         }
